review: Buffering is awful on Netflix. Had I known how crappy this was I wouldn't have spent the $50. Should have returned it. Amazon prime doesn't have near the amount of free movies netflix does so I prefer netflix.
author: barb dilliard

review: We use this at our cottage for Netflix and more! It is fantastic technology and will save us tons on our cable bill. I am also able to access my premium channels from any tv that I install the fire stick on- which is nice... The interface is simple enough for my 6 year old to navigate.
author: Steven A. Wambaugh "S. Wamba"

review: I have had constant problems with the Fire Stick since I purchased it.  Apps and videos freeze, pause, restart, freeze again, etc.  Often I get a "video error" when watching certain news apps.  VERY frustrating.  I have tried ALL of the trouble shooting suggestions from Amazon and everyone else and nothing works.  I e-mailed customer service and they suggested I call them.  I HATE calling anyone's customer service only to be told to do the exact same things I have already done.  My Internet connection is strong, there is nothing wrong with my TV, etc..... VERY frustrating.  I really wanted to like the Fire Stick so that I can disconnect from COMCAST completely.
author: d still

review: Simply perfect. Does everything I need. Wish I could connect with my laptop/tablet without internet access. Also would be nice if Bluetooth capable for headphones or had a headphone jack on remote. But not a big deal.

review: I still can't figure out what it is for and what it does for me that me smart TV didn't already do. I really tried to read and understand the description on the web, but it didn't make sense to me. I guess I am technically challenged.
author: Neil A Lash

review: I am so unbelievably disappointed with this unit. I bought the stick to view Netflix and it continuously stops mid viewing to stream stops at 25% and then gives an error.  I have reviewed other posts about this problem and the general consensus is that Netflix and Fire TV stick need to get their act together and fix the bug. Otherwise I would absolutely love this technology. I do not understand why this is a problem. I would love to hear any fixes but so far nothing helps.
